entryValidationRulesParser: [REQUIRE][IF MATCH_REGULAR_EXPRESSION(sampleType, 'plant voucher'), MATCH_REGULAR_EXPRESSION('div_voucher_in.voucherSampleID.pla')] [IF MATCH_REGULAR_EXPRESSION(sampleType, 'small mammal'), MATCH_REGULAR_EXPRESSION('div_voucher_in.voucherSampleID.mam')] [IF MATCH_REGULAR_EXPRESSION(sampleType, 'herptile voucher'), MATCH_REGULAR_EXPRESSION('div_voucher_in.voucherSampleID.herp')] [IF (sampleType = 'plant genetic tissue archive'), MATCH_REGULAR_EXPRESSION('div_voucher_in.voucherSampleID.noV')]

description: Unique identifier for the voucher sample
entryValidationRulesForm: [IF MATCH_REGULAR_EXPRESSION(sampleType, 'plant voucher'),  'pla.' + siteID +  '.' + startDate + '.' + collectTime + '.' + [a-z]{2,3} + '.V' + [0-9]{1+}][IF MATCH_REGULAR_EXPRESSION(sampleType, 'mammal'), siteID + '.' + startDate + '.' + tagID + '.V']
